data.title: What is the national language of Nicaragua? - FAQ
data.meta_description: Spanish is spoken in the western and central part of Nicaragua. In the Caribbean areas other languages are spoken: Creole, Garifuna and Miskito. English is often spoken by tourism service providers in touristic areas. Some locals speak English as well, because they have lived in the US.
data.text: Spanish is spoken in the western and central part of Nicaragua. In the Caribbean areas other languages are spoken: Creole, Garifuna and Miskito. English is often spoken by tourism service providers in touristic areas. Some locals speak English as well, because they have lived in the US.
